nodes.bodyText: I think this will lead to NPE when computeNext method is executed, because currentIterator is null.
computeNext cannot be executed after endOfData(); execution
computeNext is a protected method to be executed by the abstract iterator only. After endOfData() - computeNext() won't be executed anymore
Yeah, you are right, I missed that. The code looks good to me then. Can you add a test case for this? I checked and existing tests didn't cover this case.
Btw it just came to my mind that the name listIterator does not quite make sense because the input is a Collection of iterators, not List of iterators.
Added tests and renamed to collectionIterator
